original_text: “When you come into the land that the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not learn to follow the abominable practices of those nations.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에 들어가거든 너는 그 민족들의 가증한 행위를 본받지 말 것이니

sentences.original_text: When you come into the land
that the Lord your God is giving you
you shall not learn to follow
the abominable practices of those nations.
